data.text: Mɛma wo so, me Onyankopɔn, me Ɔhene;
Ɛda biara, mɛkamfo wo;
Awurade so, na ɔsɛ nkamfo kɛseɛ;
Awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ baako bɛkamfo wo nnwuma akyerɛ ɔfoforɔ;
Wɔbɛka wʼanimuonyam ne wo tumi a ɛhran no ho asɛm,
Wɔbɛka wo nnwuma a ɛyɛ hu no mu tumi ho asɛm;
Wɔbɛhyɛ wo papayɛ mmorosoɔ no ho fa,
Awurade yɛ ɔdomfoɔ ne mmɔborɔhunufoɔ;
Awurade yɛ ma obiara;
Ao Awurade, wʼabɔdeɛ nyinaa bɛkamfo wo;
Wɔbɛka wʼahennie no animuonyam ho asɛm
sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a nnipa bɛhunu wo nnwuma akɛseɛ
Wʼahennie yɛ daa ahennie,
Awurade wowa wɔn a wɔhwe ase
Ani nyinaa hwɛ wo ɛkwan,
Wobue wo nsam
Awurade tene wɔ nʼakwan nyinaa mu;
Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyinaa,
Ɔyɛ wɔn a wɔsuro no no apɛdeɛ ma wɔn;
Awurade hwɛ wɔn a wɔdɔ no nyinaa so,
Mʼano bɛkamfo Awurade.
